title: War of the Spanish Succession results

content.prompt: A major result of the War of the Spanish Succession (1701-1713) and the Treaty of Utrecht (1713-1714) was to

choices.label: unite the Spanish and French thrones under a Bourbon ruler
finalize the decline of the British navy after a short-lived domination
cause a long-term decline in international commerce and trade
introduce significant new developments in warfare and weapons
prevent France from upsetting the balance of power

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
